wpPost.content:
ULOCO reached 10000UU/month in DEC 2020. Thanks a lot.

Accesses from direct has been increasing since I launched this service. This means that new visitors access to ULOCO and most of them remember my service and re-visit.

To my surprise, recently I can see creatorsâ€™ projects which use ULOCOâ€™s Illustrations by chance. Their projectsâ€™ quality is so high. Iâ€™m so glad of that.

Honestly, a few month ago I judged this project was failed because it was difficult to earn enough money. But some users shared ULOCO for me. This is grateful.

Now I work hard to develop other service. But I keep managing ULOCO in the furture.
